name: Residence Inn Portland Downtown / Waterfront Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: In May when I first started looking for hotels to stay for a night in July, so many hotels were booked. This hotel was still being finished and was not taking reservations. I booked a room at the Portland Regency. Reading the reviews for the Regency, I was a bit concerned. But it was only 1 night. As we got closer, I noticed the Residence was taking reservations. I wasn't sure about the area, but decided to switch to the Residence Inn. We are so glad we did. The night we came in, there were many storms up and down the East Coast. We left D.C. 3 hours late. It was 3:15AM and pouring rain when we arrived. We were pleasantly greeted and given our room in quick fashion. We even bought some food to munch on since we were starving. Thankfully the store was open. The room was great. Spacious, clean and had everything we needed. We unpacked and fell asleep immediately in the very comfortable bed. The manager offered a late check-out since we got there so late. We took him up on the offer. We weren't able to eat breakfast, but picked up some yogurt, tea, coffee and the paper later. The location is not in the center, but is so close you can walk everywhere. I wish we had the opportunity to stay longer, but were driving up North. We would definitely stay here again!
reviews.title: So happy we found this hotel!

description: Portland, Maine's only all suite hotel is located in the heart of the historic Old Port district. The Residence Inn by Marriott Downtown/Waterfront is perfect for business trips, family vacations, relocation, corporate housing, and small meetings. Business travelers will find easy access to all organizations in Portland, Maine. The hotel is near major attractions that include the birthplace of the poet Henry Wadsworth Longfellow, the Casco Bay Lines Ferry Terminal, Merrill Auditorium, Ocean Gateway Terminal, Cumberland County Civic Center, and Portland Museum of Art. Whether you are in town for a Maine lobster roll and blueberry pie or to sample the premier cuisine of the city's award-winning chefs, all are just a stone's throw from our doorstep. Book now to stay with us and experience legendary Marriott service.
